languages.text: {n}Вид алкоголя вызывает у вас легкую тошноту. Пожалуй, пить вам больше не стоит.{/n}
{n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вид алкоголя вызывает у вас легкую тошноту. Пожалуй, пить вам больше не стоит.{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看到酒，你就感觉胃里一阵翻腾，或许你不该再喝了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看到酒，你就感觉胃里一阵翻腾，或许你不该再喝了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}酒を見た瞬間、軽い吐き気を催した。これ以上飲まないほうがいいだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}酒を見た瞬間、軽い吐き気を催した。これ以上飲まないほうがいいだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con solo ver el licor se te revuelve un poco el estómago. A lo mejor no deberías beber más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con solo ver el licor se te revuelve un poco el estómago. A lo mejor no deberías beber más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçkinin görüntüsü, biraz mideni biraz bulandırıyor. Muhtemelen bu noktada içmeye son vermelisin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İçkinin görüntüsü, biraz mideni biraz bulandırıyor. Muhtemelen bu noktada içmeye son vermelisin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La vue de l'alcool vous donne un début de nausée. Vous feriez mieux de vous abstenir d'en boire davantage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La vue de l'alcool vous donne un début de nausée. Vous feriez mieux de vous abstenir d'en boire davantage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Anblick des Alkohols weckt eine leichte Übelkeit in dir. Du solltest wohl besser nichts mehr davon trinken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the liquor makes you a little nauseous. You probably should not drink any more of it.{/n}
